heading: HR00096
0: A RESOLUTION CALLING ON THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON WELFARE OF CHILDREN TO LOOK INTO THE ADVERSE EFFECTS OF CHARACTER-BASED VIDEO GAMES ON CHILDREN AND PRESCRIBE COUNTERMEASURES TO CURB, IF NOT DISCOURAGE YOUNGSTERS FROM ENGAGING IN SUCH CHARACTER-BASED VIDEO GAMES
status: Pending with the Committee on WELFARE OF CHILDREN since 2016-09-05
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00096
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION CALLING ON THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON WELFARE OF CHILDREN TO LOOK INTO THE ADVERSE EFFECTS OF CHARACTER-BASED VIDEO GAMES ON CHILDREN AND PRESCRIBE COUNTERMEASURES TO CURB, IF NOT DISCOURAGE YOUNGSTERS FROM ENGAGING IN SUCH CHARACTER-BASED VIDEO GAMES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2016-07-20
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WELFARE OF CHILDREN ON 2016-09-05
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2016-08-02;
